amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities, Counties, And Other Political Subdivisions
amendatorysection.catchline: Grants of assistance; engineering and technical studies.
amendatorysection.para: (1) The department shall use the fund to provide grants of assistance for engineering and technical studies directly related to projects described in section 13-2704.01.
(2) Applications for grants of assistance pursuant to this section shall be evaluated by the department pursuant to section 13-2707.01.
